price: Nitekim, çevrenizdeki şehirleri de helak etmiştik. Belki dönerler diye ayetleri tafsilli olarak açıklamıştık da...
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā mā ḥawlakum mina al-qurā waṣarrafnā al-āyāti laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
